thread.title: Berlusconi backs far-right ally for premier

title: Berlusconi backs far-right ally for premier
text:
Berlusconi backs far-right ally for premier 4:29pm GMT - 01:22 
Silvio Berlusconi has thrown his weight behind a far-right ally's candidacy to be Italy's next prime minister. Matteo Salvini's League won 17 percent of the vote last Sunday, to 14 percent for former premier Berlusconi's Forza Italia. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Silvio Berlusconi has thrown his weight behind a far-right ally's candidacy to be Italy's next prime minister. Matteo Salvini's League won 17 percent of the vote last Sunday, to 14 percent for former premier Berlusconi's Forza Italia.
